title: Star Trek XII: So Very Tired
featuredTitle: Star Trek XII: So Very Tired
description: The original cast of Star Trek in their latest, greatest adventure.
quote: Captain’s log: Stardate 6051. Had trouble sleeping last night. My hiatal hernia is acting up.
starring: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, George Takei
altHero: the deck of the Enterprise with the crew looking very old and tired
alt1: Kirk is wrinkled and wearing glasses
alt4: Scotty has gotten a bit fat and can’t reach the controls
